Name: Stela
Description: This limestone stela belonging to Hat is carved in relief, in the arch are two udjat-eyes flanking a shen-ring. In the scene below a man and a woman are seated together before an offering table, the woman holds a lotus flower. A man stands opposite and facing them, one arm is raised and he wears a short kilt. Above the figures are inscribed the names and titles.In two horizontal lines below the scene is inscribed the standard htp-dj-nsw offering formula.
